biotools.summary: Java application for the design of RNA nanostructures. Among other things, it can accomplish the following: 1) Detection, extraction and annotation of RNA structural elements, 2) Use of RNA building blocks for assemblying larger structures, 3) Combinatorial search of building blocks 4) Optimization of building block positions 5) Topology classification 6) Sequence Optimization (i.e. sequence design for self-assembly into the given topology).

bioschemas.name: NanoTiler
